attributes.action: Create a system whereby parents of large children may recover/claim back VAT on adult clothes and shoes bought for their child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children nowadays are generally taller and larger than generations ago leading to childrens clothes and shoes not being large enough.

This results in parents having to buy adult clothes which include VAT and adult shoes/trainers. There should be a system whereby if you can prove the size of your child you can reclaim the VAT. My son is 12 and has size 8 feet already and is 167cm tall.
